notifies.widget_copied_body: The widget is successfully copied and ready to setup
notifies.widget_copied_fail_body: The widget isn't copied. Perhaps errors in send form
notifies.widget_delete_body: The widget is successfully removed from system
notifies.widget_send_data_not_changed_body: The form isn't sent since on it changes haven't been made
notifies.widget_send_has_error_body: The form isn't sent since as contains mistakes
notifies.widget_send_server_error_body: The form isn't sent, problems with the server
